alternativeNames: Blumer, von S.; Blumer, von Samuel
examples: Sphaerotheca volkartii S.Blumer, Beitr. Kryptfl. Schweiz 7(no. 1): 115 (1933)
notes: Eponymy: Blumeria Golovin ex E.O.Speer (1975); in 'von S. Blumer' or 'von Samuel Blumer', the term von is an error; it is not part of the name; in German, von = wriiten by or from, alluding to authorship of a publication]
source: CMI; Birth year from: Lotte Burkhardt (B); Death year in TL-2/Supplement
